main event: A flaming, light blue ball was observed disintegrating over Itazuke Air Base.
interesting points: The object left a trail of flaming pieces as it disintegrated., The sighting lasted for approximately 3-4 seconds., The observation was made by military personnel., The course of the object was westerly., The intelligence officer considered the sighting reliable and suggested it might be a meteor.
witness description: pilots of the 8th Fighter Bomber Wing
